category: news
title: "Google Rebrands Bard AI To Gemini, Introduces New App And Subscription Model"
excerpt: "Google revealed a significant redesign of Bard, their AI chatbot and assistant, on Thursday. The new look includes a new app and subscription choices. Now known as Gemini, the chatbot’s AI model suite shares the same name as Bard, the main rival of OpenAI’s ChatGPT."
